description: There is a kitchen on the image. On the right you can find a coral toaster, and there is a sink with a bowl located in the center. There is a gold bowl inside the sink. Probably, i need to clean the bowl or make toasts.

objects.name: banana
objects.location: The banana is located in the center of the image. It is next to an apple and a toaster.
objects.relationship: The banana is next to the apple and the toaster

objects.name: apple
objects.location: The apple is located on the left side of the image. It is next to a banana and a toaster.
objects.relationship: The apple is next to the banana and the toaster

objects.name: toaster
objects.location: This toaster is located on the table on the right side of the image. To his left is a pink plate. There is a sink in front of it. There is a socket behind it
objects.relationship: There is a bread inside toaster

objects.name: plate
objects.location: The plate is located in the center of the image. It's in front of the toaster. There are no other objects around
objects.relationship: The plate is on the table
